entry.title: An Oracle Of Roses
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,199Chapters: 11/17Kudos: 420

Summary: Arthur Pendragon, Prince Regent of the Albion Empire, always feared he would face an arranged marriage. Now, as he desperately struggles to restore magic in the hopes of saving his sister, the answer is obvious. He must marry Lord Emrys, the scion of a noble, magical line. Both men know their duty. Their union would bring all Albion back into balance, but the world is not a simple place, and neither of them make a good first impression. Will they be able to overcome their doubts, or is their match doomed to fail?

entry.title: The Bond Series: Season 2: Episode 1
entry.summary:
Author: Foreverwolf_6

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,530Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Home isn't Home. Change is for the young, they say. Arthur and Merlin struggle to build their dream of Albion while facing old enemies from within, and a new enemy on the horizon threatens to destroy everything. Consequences for a choice made long ago rear. Are they strong enough to stand united, or will they falter? Season 2 of The Bond Series (I have fixed and reposted Season 1- I suggest you read that first, or this season won't make much sense). Note, you'll see each "book" in this season titled as an episode- make's it easier to follow the timeline, I think. For those who wished for less Merlin Whump and more Arthur- I have failed you, deeply :( I did make efforts to respect the "I wish Merlin was conscious more" requests!

entry.summary:
Author: liviapeleia

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,453Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 152

Summary: A season 1 canon divergent AU told through Reddit posts. Gaius and Uther are having a secret love affair. Somehow, Geoffrey might be involved. Arthur has more throwaway accounts than brain cells, Morgana is a SJW (affectionate), Gwen is the only sane person, and Merlin is absolutely not in love, no way, never. And how the hell does Kilgharrah's cave have WiFi?

entry.title: When I'm 6 Feet Under and the Bugs are Eating my Heart, All they will Taste is You
entry.summary:
Author: Ap_1238

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,947Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 22

Summary: This is me simply trying to cope the heartbreak that was the finale of Merlin. I watched this show years ago and was distraught to see an edit pop back up. I'll be real, I cried for 2 days straight----The feeling of grief is hard to define.For Arthur Pendragon it was losing everything he thought he had.If only he could see the gold in the night sky.ORthe eyes of someone he loves.----Post season 5 finale. He's not DEAD.Arthur trying to cope with all the pressure.He has a kingdom to rule, a wife to love.But how can he do that if he can't figure out what is in his own heart.----OK IM MAKING THIS SEEM SO ANGSTYIT'S CUTE AND FUNNY TOO I PROMISE*Note: If you are uncomfortable with the idea of Mpreg please do not fret. I'm trying to make this story so you can feel a resolution without feeling pressured to read the whole. For the rest of the freaks (me too babe) I hope you enjoy this beatiful coping mechanism!

entry.title: Bitchy
entry.summary:
Author: luvroykent

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,117Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Arthur never thought he would see the day that his court physician prescribed daily orgasms as the solution to his problems. However, here he is. Arthur has carried a secret his entire life. No one but Gaius knows that his intense mood swings are a result of his unique anatomy (modern day PMS, but magnified). Despite many attempts, he can’t seem to control his emotions, threatening his ability to rule. Gaius’s suggestion is his last hope. As he continues his “treatment”, he quickly realizes his desires are growing for a certain manservant. Merlin takes it upon himself to serve his king beyond what the usual servant duties entail. Will they be able to maintain their indifference, or will their indulgence lead to something more?

entry.title: Only One Way Through
entry.summary:
Author: maryjanerambles

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,103Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: "After a night spent tossing and turning in her bed, Gwen could only see one path forward: she would keep Merlin's secret and try her best to save him from his own impulsivity. Merlin was one of the bravest people Gwen knew, but he was also one of the most foolish. Anyone who would walk up to Prince Arthur and call him an ass clearly needed somebody to watch their back." AU where Gwen figures out that Merlin has magic early in season one, and realizes she's in a great position to make sure he and Morgana support each other.

entry.title: A Legend that Begins With a Crush
entry.summary:
Author: Clearwater96

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,813,706Chapters: 117/?Kudos: 1,544

Summary: Arthur Pendragon and Merlin were literally from two different worlds. One is a prince from a great kingdom and the other a common farm boy from the next kingdom over. These two should have never met.But that was before they realized their parents were once friends and arranged the two of them to marry when they reached adulthood. That was before Uther turned on magic and Hunith went on the run with her infant son.Now, twenty years have passed and the Prince, Arthur Pendragon is far out of his depth. After four months of marriage and learning what he has about Merlin, he knows that things need to change, but doesn’t know what can be done.And with every attempt at trying going wrong, with mysterious boys showing up wanting to be a knight, strange physician’s trying to coerce his consort away, even stranger ladies who’ve seen to weaken Arthur’s brain, and the arrival of an odd Druid boy they need to risk it all just to get to safety…will Arthur ever get things to go right?

Summary: This is a Merlin rewrite and I'm gonna be honest I have a lot of hopes and expectations for this so not sure if I'll ever finish.Merlin finds out about the prophecy and how things are supposed to play out and actively steers against it all. Basically imagine if Merlin saw everything how it played out in the show and then he, rethinks what to do and how to choose.

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 298,238Chapters: 64/100Kudos: 2,986

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…
